title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message:
820-3115 board, there was no green light then i notice u7000 not good, i changed it , now green light , and ppbus_g3h im getting 14.-15 v, b4 doing all the work i took out f7040 fuse, 



why its 14.5 v ? what do i check

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: Check sense resistors R7020, R7021, R7022, R7050, R7051, R7052....

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message:
Your multimeter's batteries are dead. Fucked up R7050/R7051/R7052 will cause battery not charging or quarter fan spin, R7020/R7021/R7022 are the only ones that will cause voltage change, and that's voltage [I]drop[/I], not increase. 

Is it turning on?

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: all R7020, R7021, R7022, R7050, R7051, R7052.... is good, yes it turns on if i connect the the fuse... i didnt run it more then one min what if 14v do some harm,.... my multimeter is good...

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: louissssssssss  i fixed it ..!!!!!! r7051 and r7052 was disconnected from r7050,,.... i had to do jumper.... chk picture!!!!!

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: louissssssssss  i fixed it ..!!!!!! r7051 and r7052 was disconnected from r7050,,.... i had to do jumper.... chk picture!!!!!

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: Good work, just one advice, don't run wires over ISL, go around it....

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: now everything is fine but battery not charging... computer work all good, no yellow light , green light on all the time.. any advice?

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: did you try a smc reset? If nothing happens...check u7000 pins 27/28 on resistance mode and write down values 17/18 pins too, I had the same problem on the same board 2 days ago.

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: As I told you from the first time, check sense resistors and traces of course, also check voltage on pins 4 and 6 from J6950, both should have about 3.4V......

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: [COLOR=#333333][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=13px]CHGR_BGATE pin from U7000 going to Q7055 good, and 12v, which should be 5 v to turn on q7055.  why chgr_bgate 12V???[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: Could be a bad battery too.....

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message:
i put a good battery , still same thing   [FONT=inherit] [FONT=inherit][COLOR=#333333][FONT=Verdana][FONT=inherit][SIZE=13px]CHGR_BGATE pin from U7000 going to Q7055 good, and 12v, which should be 5 v to turn on q7055. why chgr_bgate 12V???[/SIZE][/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR][/FONT]

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: Can you measure resistance on C7050 (one probe on pin 1 the other in pin 2), report value...

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: check current sensing circuit for charger as well. if it charges when it is OFF but not when it is ON, R7020/R7021/R7022/traces between them may be broken

title: 820-3115-b board, ppbus_g3h 14.24v!!
message: Is the battery detected in OSX?
